page.title: 13Lodge Lane
page.content: This is the name of a very busy street in our area. There are a lot of shops in Lodge Lane and it is a good place to go shopping. A lot of the shops have been renovated since the summer of 1981 when many of the shops were damaged during the Toxteth riots. Lodge Lane is a very old street and its name comes from the fact that originally Lodge Lane led to Lodge Farm which was situated at Otterspool. When we were doing our survey of Lodge Lane we found out that Lodge Lane also has an open air street market on the site of some demolished homes. The only banks that were in our area were situated on Lodge Lane. We also found out that service shops such as hair-dressers had not been given a separate category on the count survey data so they had to be listed under the category of non-food shops.
